summary: Seven close friends reunite for the wedding of two of their friends. Problems arise because the bride and the maid of honor have had a long rivalry over the groom.
cast: Katie Holmes|Josh Duhamel|Anna Paquin|Malin Akerman|Adam Brody|Dianna Agron|Jeremy Strong|Rebecca Lawrence Levy|Candice Bergen|Elijah Wood|James K. Schaffer|Rosemary Murphy|Warrent F. McKnight|Will Hutchins|Evelyn Aronin|Brian James Pepe|Peter J. Rowan|Mark Santomauro
keywords: wedding|friend|maid of honor|college friends|adaptation directed by original author
title: The Romantics
